title: Spot Trades
content: Use our platform or call through to your relationship manager to book todays rate. We provide our clients with the flexibility of two whole days to send in funds.

title: Market Orders
content: Set target rates and let our team notify you. Reduce risk with stop losses during volatile markets.

title: Fixed Forwards
content: You can book today’s rate and pay for it up to a whole year later. It would be a specific date you wish.

title: Window Forwards
content: When you need currency over a certain amount of time you can book a bulk amount at today’s rate and pay for it as and when you need to send/receive currency.

title: Timing of Trades
content: Our experienced traders at Vanderpump FX provide our clients with key market analysis, enabling them to save a further 2-3% on average by acting when the market is in their favour. Our online platform has received backing from Google Ventures, which recently invested over £4 million in our payment technology, enabling us to create the easiest and most efficient way of dealing with international payments.
